asgn2Restaurant

Class LogHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Restaurant.LogHandler

  • public class LogHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains methods that use the information in the log file to return Pizza and Customer object - either as an individual Pizza/Customer object or as an ArrayList of Pizza/Customer objects.
    Author:
    Person A and Person B

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String line)
      Creates a Customer object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file.
      static Pizza createPizza(java.lang.String line)
      Creates a Pizza object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Customer> populateCustomerDataset(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Pizza> populatePizzaDataset(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.

    • Method Detail

      • populateCustomerDataset

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Customer> populateCustomerDataset(java.lang.String filename)
                                                             throws CustomerException,
                                                                    LogHandlerException
        Returns an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of the log file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
        Throws:
        CustomerException - If the log file contains semantic errors leading that violate the customer constraints listed in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification or contain an invalid customer code (passed by another class).
        LogHandlerException - If there was a problem with the log file not related to the semantic errors above

      • populatePizzaDataset

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Pizza> populatePizzaDataset(java.lang.String filename)
                                                       throws PizzaException,
                                                              LogHandlerException
        Returns an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file. .
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of the log file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Pizza objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file. .
        Throws:
        PizzaException - If the log file contains semantic errors leading that violate the pizza constraints listed in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification or contain an invalid pizza code (passed by another class).
        LogHandlerException - If there was a problem with the log file not related to the semantic errors above

      • createCustomer

        public static Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String line)
                               throws CustomerException,
                                      LogHandlerException
        Creates a Customer object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file. The format of each line is outlined in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification.
        Parameters:
        line - - A line from the log file
        Throws:
        CustomerException - - If the log file contains semantic errors leading that violate the customer constraints listed in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification or contain an invalid customer code (passed by another class).
        LogHandlerException - - If there was a problem parsing the line from the log file.

      • createPizza

        public static Pizza createPizza(java.lang.String line)
                         throws PizzaException,
                                LogHandlerException
        Creates a Pizza object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file. The format of each line is outlined in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification.
        Parameters:
        line - - A line from the log file
        Throws:
        PizzaException - If the log file contains semantic errors leading that violate the pizza constraints listed in Section 5.3 of the Assignment Specification or contain an invalid pizza code (passed by another class).
        LogHandlerException - - If there was a problem parsing the line from the log file.
